Add notes effortlessly on any webpage and at any location, capturing, saving, and sharing your moments of inspiration and ideas. 

Simply right-click 'Add To Note' to get started.

Your data is always stored on your computer. The first version is now complete. I will continue to iterate, adding more skins, enhanced note features, and more. Stay tuned...
